Detailed Description

draws selected parts on screen

Functions

void create_marked_layer (int idx)

Function Documentation

void create_marked_layer (  int  idx  ) 
 

will actually create the layer set in the dialog containing all selected parts.

this is called whenever enter is pressed, Mark button is clicked or right-click/double click was recognised on a single part. parts are differentiated between by using the PART_SHAPE_ identifier set in
parse_pnp

See also:
parse_pnp()
